about_the_game:
Divinity Chronicles: Journey to the West is a rogue-like deck building game, in which you will play as the main hero with unique power that modelled as sets of cards, consumables, and relics, taking on the challenging but rewarding journey across the Realm of Divinity.

During your journey, you will encounter various monsters, spirits, celestials, demons, and legendary creatures, each of them has their own stories that are deeply intertwined with the fate of the world. To defeat your opponents, you will need to strategically use your deck of cards, relics, and consumables in a turn based combat.



However, you only have one life during the journey. With the procedurally generated routes and limited choices on each step, you also need to tactically plan your in order to reach the final destination.

This demo consists of the first chapter of the story mode gameplay; numerous new contents, heroes, features, and game modes will be added as we are developing the game. Stay tuned to our latest builds for the best game experience!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Max OS 10.10 or above
  • Processor: 2 GHz or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 4.0 compatible or above
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Max OS 10.15 or above
  • Processor: 3 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 4.1 compatible or above
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A challenging rogue-like deck building game about a legendary adventure in the Realm of Divinity. Build your unique deck, gather powerful relics and consumables to confront legendary creatures and eventually discover the truth behind the omen of darkness.
